item.title: When formal systems stop working, neighbors turn to each other in what many call 'mutual aid'
item.description: Organizers say that interest in local, grassroots initiatives to meet community needs has been growing

item.title: What is mutual aid? And why are more people turning to informal efforts to help each other?
item.description: Organizers say that in response to government funding cuts, high prices and political uncertainty, interest in mutual aid efforts has picked up

item.title: Airbus says most A320 jets now have software fix; less than 100 planes left to update
item.description: Airbus has updated most of its 6,000 A320 passenger jets to fix a software glitch that could affect flight controls
